include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/include/private)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/c)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/codec)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/core)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/effects)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/fonts)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/gpu)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/image)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/images)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/lazy)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/opts)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/pathops)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/pdf)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/ports)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/sfnt)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/shaders)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/shaders/gradients)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/sksl)

include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/utils/win)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/src/xml)
include_directories(${SKIA_ROOT}/third_party/gif)

include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/frameworks/av/media/libheif/include)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/frameworks/native/libs/arect/include)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/frameworks/native/libs/nativebase/include)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/frameworks/native/libs/nativewindow/include)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/frameworks/native/opengl/include)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/frameworks/native/vulkan/include)

include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/webp/include)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/dng_sdk/source)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/expat/lib)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/expat)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/freetype/include)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/icu/icu4c/common)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/icu/icu4c/i18n)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/libjpeg-turbo)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/piex)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/libpng)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/zlib)
include_directories(${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/sfntly/cpp/src)

#add_definitions(-U_FORTIFY_SOURCE)
#add_definitions()

add_library(libskia SHARED ${SOURCE_FILES})
target_include_directories(libskia PUBLIC
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/android
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/c
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/codec
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/config
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/core
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/effects
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/encode
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/gpu
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/gpu/gl
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/gpu/vk
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/pathops
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/ports
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/svg
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/utils
        ${SKIA_ROOT}/include/utils/mac
        )
target_compile_definitions(libskia PRIVATE
        -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=1
        -DSKIA_IMPLEMENTATION=1
        -DATRACE_TAG=ATRACE_TAG_VIEW
        )
target_compile_options(libskia PRIVATE
        -fexceptions
        -Wno-unused-parameter
        )
target_link_libraries(libskia
        libEGL
        libGLESv2
        libdng_sdk
        libexpat
        libft2
        libheif
        libicui18n
        libicuuc
        libjpeg
        liblog
        libpiex
        libpng
        libvulkan
        libz
        libcutils
        libnativewindow

        libsfntly
        libwebp-decode
        libwebp-encode
        )
